questions.text: CRR (Cash Reserve Ratio) is maintained with —
questions.explain: Banks keep a portion of NDTL as cash with the Reserve Bank of India.
Priority Sector Lending refers to RBI-mandated lending to key sectors like agriculture and MSME.

questions.text: Which of the following is a liability of a commercial bank?
questions.explain: Deposits are bank liabilities as they represent money owed to depositors.
OCDD means Ongoing Customer Due Diligence, required for continuous monitoring of accounts.

questions.text: The head office of NABARD is located in —
questions.explain: NABARD headquarters is situated in Mumbai, Maharashtra.
